title: Let It Go/Let Her Go (Frozen/Passenger MASHUP)
lyrics: Let it go let it go You only need the light when it's burning low Let it go let it go Only miss the sun when it starts to snow And here I stand, and here I'll stay Only know you love her when you let her go  The cold never bothered me anyway  Staring at the bottom of your glass Hoping one day you will make a dream last The dreams come slow and they go so fast You see her when you close your eyes Maybe one day you will understand why Everything you touch surely dies Don't let them in, don't let them see You always had to be Don't let them know Well, now they know Let it go let it go You only need the light when it's burning low Let it go let it go Only miss the sun when it starts to snow And here I stand, and here I'll stay Only know you love her when you let her go  The cold never bothered me anyway  Well you only need the light when it's burning low Only miss the sun when it starts to snow Only know you love her when you let her go  Only know you've been high when you're feeling low Only hate the road when you're missin' home Only know you love her when you've let her go Well, now they know Let it go let it go You only need the light when it's burning low Let it go let it go Only miss the sun when it starts to snow And here I stand, and here I'll stay Only know you love her when you let her go  The cold never bothered me anyway
